bibl.title: Greek Sport and Social Status

series.title: Fordyce W. Mitchel Memorial Lecture Series.

bibl.note: See in part. pp. 16-23: Posidippus and the Ptolemies; - 61-67: Palaistrophylakes [p. 67: Appendix. Evidence for the Palaistrophylax. 3. Papyri].
bibl.seg: Mark Golden, Greek Sport and Social Status = Fordyce W. Mitchel Memorial Lecture Series.
Austin, TX, University of Texas Press, 2008, 8°, xviii-214 pp. ISBN 978-0-292-71869-2 (hbk) / 978-0-292-72153-1 (pbk). $50 (hbk) / $25 (pbk).
See in part. pp. 16-23: Posidippus and the Ptolemies; - 61-67: Palaistrophylakes [p. 67: Appendix. Evidence for the Palaistrophylax. 3. Papyri].

C.R. par Jens Bartels, Sehepunkte < http://www.sehepunkte.de/2010/02/15930.html >. - Reyes Bertolín, CR N.S., 60 (2010) pp. 183-185. - Paul Christesen, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2009/2009-10-15.html >. - Nigel B. Crowther, Mouseion (Canada) 7 (2007) pp. 267-270. - Nigel J. Nicholson, JHS 130 (2010) pp. 239-240. - Henri W. Pleket, Nikephoros 22 (2009 [2011]) pp. 223-231.
